posts.post_content:
I have the following T205 graded cards being offered for sale at $20 per card.

Please add $2.95 for USPS shipping for 1st card and add $1.00 for each additional card.

Charles Hemphill, Piedmont, SGC 10, SOLD
Ed Summers, Sweet Caparol, GAI 1.5
Robert Byrne, Polar Bear, GAI 1
Harry Steinfeldt, GAI 1.5

Payment via paypal gift or personal check.

Thanks,

Tom S.

I am open to e90 to e106, T3, sporting news supplements, as trades. Just ask equal value for equal value.

Let me know what you have. Otherwise they are heading to EBAY next weekend.

Thanks,

Tom
